attributes.action: Stop insurance companies demanding information on expired driving convistions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have had a speeding fine 4 years ago and this expired after 3 years, why should you still be questioned and punished on this offence? At the moment, insurance companies demand to know of any speeding offences within the last 5 years and increase their premium accordingly. So you still pay out for doing 35mph in a 30mph apeed limit, 5 years later.
